mapper.select: select * from content where member_idx=#{member_idx} and to_char(writetime,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{uploadDate} order by writetime desc
select * from content where member_idx = #{member_idx} order by content_idx desc

select * from content where member_idx = #{idx} and content_idx in (select content_idx from coverage where coverage_state=0 or coverage_State=1 or coverage_state=2 and idx_to like #{idx_like} or coverage_state=3 and idx_to not like #{idx_like}) order by writetime desc
select * from content where member_idx = #{idx} and content_idx in (select content_idx from coverage where coverage_state=0) order by writetime desc
select max(content_idx) from content where member_idx = #{member_idx}
mapper.update: update content set profile = #{path} where member_idx = #{member_idx}
update content set writetime = sysdate, content = #{content} where content_idx = #{content_idx}
update coverage set coverage_state = #{coverage_state}, idx_to = #{idx_to}, idx_group = #{idx_group} where content_idx = #{cidx}
